LanguageData.LingXCG_AutoMedical.label: auto heal chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_AutoMedical.description: A chip that can respond to the human immune system can automatically treat a disease when it is found that can be treated, because the installed artificial intelligence level is low, it needs to read part of the knowledge of the installer to work better, and the treatment effect is linked to the level of medical knowledge of the installer.
LanguageData.LingXCG_BeyondTime.label: out of time chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_BeyondTime.description: A special engraving, after installation will no longer age for any reason, but also can not be younger.
LanguageData.LingXCG_BodyReconstruction.label: limb reconstruction chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_BodyReconstruction.description: A special chip that can repair the missing limb for the installer, but it takes time to accumulate material, and if too many parts are disabled at once, it may take more time to repair.
LanguageData.LingXCG_BodyRegeneration.label: tissue regeneration chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_BodyRegeneration.description: A chip that can detect the wound on the wearer's body and actively assist in regenerating the limb can speed up the recovery of the wound, which is not affected by the natural recovery rate because it is not natural.
LanguageData.LingXCG_DoubleSelf.label: double self chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_DoubleSelf.description: By inserting a clone into the body through special technology, most of the power becomes twice that of the body, and so is the consumption.
LanguageData.LingXCG_EnvironmentalAdaptation.label: environment adaptation chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_EnvironmentalAdaptation.descript: A chip that can analyze the state of the environment and regulate the body's performance could enable the installer to better adapt to extreme environments.
LanguageData.LingXCG_Invincible.label: perfect external chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_Invincible.description: A special engraving that can ignore almost any external damage, therefore, no need for resilience.
LanguageData.LingXCG_Invisible.label: presence weakening chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_Invisible.description: A chip that weakens the presence of the installation, making it impossible for an enemy to target the installer.
LanguageData.LingXCG_MechBandwidth.label: Virtual bandwidth
LanguageData.LingXCG_MechBandwidth.description: A special adapter can take advantage of the bandwidth of human consciousness simulation, which can greatly increase the upper limit of the number of control machines, and can be stacked up to 10 times.
LanguageData.LingXCG_MechBandwidthPlus.label: Zero-type expansion bandwidth
LanguageData.LingXCG_MechBandwidthPlus.description: A special chip designed by zero enterprise is packaged with a large number of bandwidth managers, which can greatly increase the upper limit of the number of control machines.
LanguageData.LingXCG_MechBandwidthPlusMax.label: extended center
LanguageData.LingXCG_MechBandwidthPlusMax.description: An extension hub made using a mechanical hub can directly add an additional mechanical management thread to the installer, doubling the installer's mechanical management capabilities up to 2 times.
LanguageData.LingXCG_MentalRadiation.label: mind radiation chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_MentalRadiation.description: A chip that amplifies the mental sensitivity of the installer and, because it affects a larger area of the brain, can also improve the working speed to a certain extent.
LanguageData.LingXCG_NoHunger.label: substance synthesis chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_NoHunger.description: A chip that releases special pheromones allows the body to synthesize energy in a way that eliminates the need for the wearer to eat.
LanguageData.LingXCG_NoJoy.label: auto entertainment Chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_NoJoy.description: A special chip that secretes a variety of substances, including dopamine, stabilizes the wearer's spirits and keeps them in a happy state.
LanguageData.LingXCG_NoRest.label: neurowakefulness chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_NoRest.description: A chip that continuously releases hormones can keep an organism awake all the time, like coffee in the mind.
LanguageData.LingXCG_OldSkin.label: cured skin chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_OldSkin.description: A chip that secretes chemicals that reduce skin activity, toughens the skin to strengthen the body's defenses, but the body's natural resilience is affected by reduced activity.
LanguageData.LingXCG_PsyAdd.label: psychic convergence chip
LanguageData.LingXCG_PsyAdd.description: A modulated pseudo-personality core is set into meditation mode to continuously restore the installer's mental powers, as if someone had been helping the installer meditate.
